title: Enhance X39 launch horse visual: falling X39 background + red eyes

requirements.text: Add a subtle falling “X39” background effect behind the horse visual in the X39 Matrix launch hero block, matching the intro’s Matrix-style drop vibe (as seen in IntroScreen), without reducing readability of the hero copy or causing performance regressions.

quotes: En la imagen del caballo que se vea de fondo en caída x39 como cuándo inicia la pagina

acceptanceCriteria: In the right-side hero visual area (horse column) there is a visible but subtle falling “X39” (or “X” + “39”) rain effect behind the horse image.
The effect is visually similar in style to the intro text-rain (IntroScreen) but tuned to be lighter/less distracting than the intro.
The effect respects prefers-reduced-motion (disabled or rendered as a static non-animated fallback when reduced motion is enabled).
The effect does not block pointer events and does not interfere with layout on mobile or desktop.
No NaN/Infinity/render-loop issues occur; animation is cleaned up on unmount (no leaked timers/raf).

requirements.text: Update the launch horse hero image so the horse has clearly visible glowing red eyes, consistent with the existing red accent palette used throughout the launch hero.
acceptanceCriteria: The horse graphic used by X39MatrixLaunchHeroBlock shows distinctly visible red glowing eyes at typical viewport sizes (mobile and desktop).
Red eyes remain visible over the existing glow/drop-shadow treatments and do not appear washed out by filters.
The updated image is served as a static asset from frontend/public/assets/generated and referenced directly by the frontend (no backend image serving).

constraints: Do not edit any files under: frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.ts(x), frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts, frontend/src/main.tsx, or anything inside frontend/src/components/ui.
Keep all changes within the existing React + Tailwind architecture and ensure responsive behavior remains intact.
All visual assets must be referenced as static files under frontend/public/assets/generated (no backend image serving).
Maintain the current sky-blue accent theme and keep red accents unchanged.
nonGoals: Do not change the launch date, countdown behavior, or hero copy content beyond what is necessary to implement the requested visuals.
Do not add new navigation items or new sections for this request.
Do not implement new backend functionality for this request.

edits: Add clearly visible glowing red eyes and integrate subtle falling “X39” background motif into the horse artwork (x39-code-horse.dim_1400x1400.png > x39-code-horse-red-eyes.dim_1400x1400.png)
